Package gw.plugin.messaging

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CommitException  
    InitializationException  
    MessageFinder
    Finder instance supplied to messaging integration code via MessageReply plugin. Used to look up messages for ack.
    MessageNotFoundException  
    MessagePlugin
    Base interface for all messaging plugins (MessageRequest, MessageTransport, and MessageReply). Carries lifecycle methods used to notify the plugins when they are to be suspended, resumed, and shutdown.
    MessageReply
    Reply interface for messaging, used to supply a MessageFinder instance so that integration code can look up and acknowledge a message. The PluginCallbackHandler implementation supplied in initTools() is used to execute a block of code in a Guidewire-initiated transaction. Typically this will be used in conjunction with the MessageFinder instance to look up a message and call reportAck() on it.
    MessageRequest
    Plugin used to provide pre-processing and post-processing opportunities for message sending. beforeSend() is called just before the message is sent; afterSend is called just after. Any changes made to the message or other beans will be persisted once the afterSend() method completes. Transactions will cause the send to be aborted and retried until the retry limit is reached.
    MessageTransport
    Plugin interface implemented to dispatch an integration message to an external system. Used in conjunction with MessageRequest (for message pre- and post-processing) and MessageReply (for asynchronous message lookup and ack).
